item.title: Mitra Chem is raising $50M for its cheaper, domestic battery materials
item.description: Mitra Chem is developing materials to make lithium-iron-phosphate (LFP) batteries store more energy.

item.title: Apple’s new Workout Buddy helps you sweat smarter
item.description: Apple has launched at its WWDC 2025 conference Workout Buddy, an AI workout coach. The AI tool gathers data from both your current workout and your fi...

item.title: Paragon says it canceled contracts with Italy over government’s refusal to investigate spyware attack on journalist
item.description: The Italian government claims that accepting Paragon’s help would have compromised national security and classified information.

item.title: Apple AirPods get new features, including studio-quality audio and a camera remote

item.title: Apple unveils watchOS 26 with new design, wrist-flick gesture, and AI Workout Buddy feature
item.description: Apple unveiled watchOS 26 with new design, wrist-flick gesture, and AI Workout Buddy feature during WWDC 2025.
